question:
You have just spend a weekend staying at The Taj hotel in Mumbai. When you get home you find out that you have left a bag at the hotel. Write a letter to the manager. Explain in the letter:
*When did you visit the hotel.
*the details of your room and the bag
* how can one identify the bag
text: I am writing this letter in order to express my concern regarding a bag which is left in the hotel during my weekend visit.

I visited 'The Taj Hotel' on the 10th of June and stayed here for five days. I checked out from this place on the evening of the 14th of June. However, when I reached home then I come to know that I have left my laptop bag at the hotel.
It contains my laptop as well. I remember it was placed on a table in the room in which I spent my days. I was living in room no 251 on the fourth floor.
It was of the brand HP and black in colour. Apart from this, It also has a tag on its strap on which I had marked my name. It will help staff to identify the bag.
It would be really appreciable if you could please locate it and inform me so that I can make arrangements for its collection.
